description: GIS data:  A specified area in which the Inclusionary Housing Program is applicable. The program modifies the floor area ratio (FAR) and offers a bonus for developments that provide affordable housing.

metadata.description: GIS data:  A specified area in which the Inclusionary Housing Program is applicable. The program modifies the floor area ratio (FAR) and offers a bonus for developments that provide affordable housing.

name: Inclusionary Housing Designated Areas
